about_the_game:
It’s Time to Go to War!

From the Creators of Doodle God & Doodle Devil
Comes a New All Ages Puzzle Game!

Available in 6 Languages
Over 160 Million Players For Doodle Series Worldwide!

BECOME A TANK & ARMORED VEHICLE DESIGNER!
From the creators of the award winning Doodle God & Doodle Devil comes a new ALL ages puzzle game with a fun historical twist.
Combine artillery and other elements to create dozens of World War II
tanks and armored vehicles.

Start with four basic elements and watch your creations come alive as you create historically accurate tanks and armored vehicles that once rolled across Europe and Africa. Along the way, learn about the historic events and designers that shaped the outcome of the free world.

It’s time to go to War in Doodle Tanks!

NEW GAMEPLAY FEATURES
✔ Dozens of Tank and Armored Vehicles to Engineer and Build
✔ Over 100 reactions to perform and over 200 elements to combine
✔ Learn about the legends of Tank & Armored Vehicle Design
✔ ALL ages puzzle fun with a historical twist

From the Creators of Doodle God & Doodle Devil

Start with four basic elements and watch your creations come alive as you create historically accurate tanks and armored vehicles that once rolled across Europe and Africa. Along the way, learn about the historic events and designers that shaped the outcome of the free world.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Kernel 3.0
  • Processor: AMD Atholon 64 X2 Dual-Core 4000+ or better / Intel Core 2 Duo Processor 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI X1800 or better / nVidia 7800 or better / Intel 4100 or better. 512MB Video RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7, 10.8, 10.9, 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Processor 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better. 512MB Video RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Doodle Tanks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: AMD Atholon 64 X2 Dual-Core 4000+ or better / Intel Core 2 Duo Processor 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI X1800 or better / nVidia 7800 or better / Intel 4100 or better. 512MB Video RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: It’s Time to Go to War! From the Creators of Doodle God & Doodle Devil Comes a New All Ages Puzzle Game! BECOME A TANK & ARMORED VEHICLE DESIGNER!
supported_languages:
English, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
